description:
A mysterious letter, a long cab ride, a mansion where nothing is quite as it seems. Help me investigate my missing friend, find the truth about the mysterious mansion, and solve puzzles across time periods in a futuristic time travelling UFO.

Enjoy this classic adventure style game with mind bending puzzles, dry humour and a unique hand/mouse drawn art style. Itâ€™s an experience no adventure fan should miss out on.
name: UFO: Henfield
intro: A point and click puzzle adventure game set across multiple time periods. Discover a surreal story about a mysterious letter, a missing professor and a confusing mansion.
